Name: Lightning Strike
Desc:
Attacks Lightning Brand targets and drops lightning bolts. Relentless Fury's combo attacks and Lightning Vortex can create the brand on enemies without it.
When you attack a Lightning Brand target with a Chain skill (except Sea Wave), a combo attack from Relentless Fury, or Lightning Vortex, the power of the brand and the accumulated lightning power from the chain attack combine to create a massive thunderbolt. The lightning bolts and thunderbolts do not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Required Skill: Annihilation Lv. 30 or higher
